channel.description: Recent content in User Management on DefectDojo Documentation

item.title: Audit Logs
item.description: Audit logs for DefectDojo can be accessed in a few different ways. Individual Object Logs DefectDojo objects each have an associated Object History, which can be accessed through the UI.

item.title: Permissions in DefectDojo
item.description: If you have a team of users working in DefectDojo, it’s important to set up Role-Based Access Control (RBAC) appropriately so that users can only access specific data.

item.title: Set a User's permissions
item.description: Introduction to Permission Types Individual users have four different kinds of permission that they can be assigned: Users can be assigned as Members to Products or Product Types.

item.title: Share permissions: User Groups
item.description: If you have a significant number of DefectDojo users, you may want to create one or more Groups, in order to set the same Role-Based Access Control (RBAC) rules for many users simultaneously.

item.title: ðŸŸ§ Set Permissions in Pro
item.description: Permissions in DefectDojo Pro have been simplified, to make it easier to assign object access. This feature can be accessed through the Beta UI.

item.title: Action permission charts
item.description: Role Permission Chart This chart is intended to list all permissions related to a Product or Product Type, as well as which permissions are available to each role.

item.title: SSO Configuration (OAuth, SAML)
item.description: Users can connect to DefectDojo with a Username and Password, but if you prefer, you can allow users to authenticate using a Single Sign-On or SSO method.
